email.emailerSubject: Registration Confirmation for Campus Tour | Masters’ Union
email.emailDescription:
Thank you for expressing an interest in Campus Tour by Masters’ Union.

Join us on 24th February at 11AM in Masters’ Union Campus, Tower A - DLF Cyberpark, Gurgaon.


Our Coordinates


Join us for a candid conversation with the Undergraduate Team.

bulletPoints.text: How we at Masters’ Union will provide you with a unique skill-building and experiential learning curriculum that will make you irresistible to recruiters.
An in-depth knowledge of the admission process, curriculum, extra-curricular activities & student life
How we inculcate industry exposure through One-on-one mentorship from CXOs, The Global Immersion Programme and One Year Industry training.

formDetails.heading: About the Event
formDetails.description: Masters’ Union is organising an information session and campus tour for all the high-school students planning to enroll in its UG Programme in Tech and Business Management. If you’re in or around Delhi NCR, join us for an open house with the Undergraduate Programme Team. For those of you who won't be able to join us at our campus, don't worry as you can also join in online via Zoom.
formDetails.bulletPointsHeading: In this session, you will learn:

bulletPoints.text: 12th-class students interested in pursuing tech & business management programmes.
Parents who’re looking to get their children enrolled in tech & business management programmes.

formDetails.heading: About the Programme
formDetails.description: The Undergraduate Programme in Technology & Business Management by Masters’ Union is a 4-year experiential programme taught by CXOs at top companies & faculty who teach at Harvard & Oxford. The programme aims to equip students with new-age specialisations such as Digital Marketing, Data Analytics, FinTech, Product Management and Entrepreneurship with year-long industry training.

title: UG Information Session and Campus Tour
description: Join us at the Masters’ Union Campus in Gurugram to know more about the Undergraduate Programme  and  interact with the Masters’ Union Undergraduate team. Open to applicants, potential applicants, and their parents.
